sql_fr_run: with tmp (select abs((cur_cnt-prv_cnt)/metric*100) as metric from (select count(1) as cur_cnt, 'Unit' as field_name from com_us_mart_03.txn_dir_redist_sls sa where sa.gl_date between (select min(period_start_date) from com_us_lake.dq_count_table where rule_key = 131)  and (select max(period_end_date) from com_us_lake.dq_count_table where rule_key = 131) and upper(sa.franchise_nm)='HEMATOLOGY' ) cur cross join (select prv_count as prv_cnt, metric, field_name from com_us_lake.dq_count_table where rule_key = 131) prv on cur.field_name=prv.field_name) select * from tmp
select case when metric > threshold then 1 else 0 end as res from corp_us_lake.dq_output_table where entity_id in ('dq_131')

with tmp (select max(abs((cur_cnt-prv_cnt)/metric*100)) as metric from ((select count(1) as cur_cnt, pr.brand_nm as product from com_us_mart_03.txn_dir_redist_sls sa join com_us_mart_03.ref_prd_prod pr on sa.prod_key = pr.prd_prod_key where sa.gl_date between (select min(period_start_date) from com_us_lake.dq_count_table where rule_key = 231)  and (select max(period_end_date) from com_us_lake.dq_count_table where rule_key = 231) and upper(sa.franchise_nm)='HEMATOLOGY' group by pr.brand_nm) cur cross join (select prv_count as prv_cnt, metric, sub_field_name as product from com_us_lake.dq_count_table where rule_key = 231) prv on cur.product=prv.product)) select * from tmp
select case when metric > threshold then 1 else 0 end as res from corp_us_lake.dq_output_table where entity_id in ('dq_231')
